name: Input text with component properties
description:
Input text with component properties

The file contains four input states: enable, focus, error, and disable. You can turn on/off different elements like labels and helpers, change their text and swap the icon.

Play with it to learn how component properties work.



About me

My name is Edward Chechique, I am a Product Designer who believes in designing and building with a team honest and simple products, with constant improvement to make people‚Äôs lives better.


I specialized in developing digital products for different software companies, focusing on user experience, user interface, design systems, research, and usability tests.

I regularly work closely with developers, product managers, and QA teams.


In addition to that, I am a moderator of design thinking workshops and mentor new designers who want to enter the UX field or improve their UX skills.
